name: Guided by the Light
description: NOTE IF YOU DON'T GO INTO THE COLOR SELECTOR BEFORE PRESSING PLAY YOUR CHARACTER  WON'T SHOW UP!!!  This is a game made for Ludum Dare 47.    Live. Die. Repeat. was my interpretation of the theme. You are a spite trying to find your way though a pitch black cave system with only a trail of lights to light your path.  Use a/d for left and right and    space/w for jump.
